title: Bug 2529: Open/Close project not always available
description: Bug 2529: Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S). Now, select both P1 and P2.
OB: When both P1 and P2 projects are selected, the Open Project menu item is available, but the Close Project menu item is not.
EB: When both P1 and P2 projects are selected, both the Open Project menu item and the Close Project menu item should be available.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create two projects P1 and P2. 2. Select project P2. 3. Attempt to close project P2.
